languages.text: "Ненависть все еще клокочет у меня внутри, но теперь я могу дать ей выход — обрушить ее на преступную падаль и даже больше... Каждый сомневающийся, любой вольнодумец или хоть в чем-то ненадежный будет судим мной, как отпетый еретик. Только так я заставлю людей почитать Лекс Империалис".

"I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Ненависть все еще клокочет у меня внутри, но теперь я могу дать ей выход — обрушить ее на преступную падаль и даже больше... Каждый сомневающийся, любой вольнодумец или хоть в чем-то ненадежный будет судим мной, как отпетый еретик. Только так я заставлю людей почитать Лекс Империалис".

Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: 「私の中では今も同じ憎しみが煮えたぎっています。ですが今は、それを解き放つ手段があります。犯罪者どもに、いえ、奴らに限らず、その怒りをぶつけることです。疑念を抱く者、勝手な思想を語る者、少しでも信頼に足る様子を欠く者、そういう連中はすべて、明らかな異端者と同様に裁くつもりです。そうして初めて、人々はレックス・インペリアに敬意を払うようになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「私の中では今も同じ憎しみが煮えたぎっています。ですが今は、それを解き放つ手段があります。犯罪者どもに、いえ、奴らに限らず、その怒りをぶつけることです。疑念を抱く者、勝手な思想を語る者、少しでも信頼に足る様子を欠く者、そういう連中はすべて、明らかな異端者と同様に裁くつもりです。そうして初めて、人々はレックス・インペリアに敬意を払うようになるでしょう」

languages.text: "In mir brodelt immer noch derselbe Hass, aber jetzt habe ich ein Ventil dafür – indem ich kriminelles Gezücht zur Strecke bringe, und nicht nur das. Alle Zweifler, alle Freidenker, alle, die das geringste Anzeichen von Unzuverlässigkeit zeigen, werde ich ebenso richten wie jeden echten Ketzer. Nur so kann ich die Leute dazu bringen, das Lex Imperia zu respektieren."
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "In mir brodelt immer noch derselbe Hass, aber jetzt habe ich ein Ventil dafür – indem ich kriminelles Gezücht zur Strecke bringe, und nicht nur das. Alle Zweifler, alle Freidenker, alle, die das geringste Anzeichen von Unzuverlässigkeit zeigen, werde ich ebenso richten wie jeden echten Ketzer. Nur so kann ich die Leute dazu bringen, das Lex Imperia zu respektieren."

languages.text: « Je sens toujours cette même haine bouillir au fond de moi, mais je sais à présent comment évacuer cette tension : en la passant sur les charognes criminelles, mais pas seulement. Chaque sceptique, chaque libre-penseur ou tout individu semblant manquer de fiabilité sera jugé par mes soins comme un hérétique. C'est à ce moment-là seulement que le peuple respectera la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Je sens toujours cette même haine bouillir au fond de moi, mais je sais à présent comment évacuer cette tension : en la passant sur les charognes criminelles, mais pas seulement. Chaque sceptique, chaque libre-penseur ou tout individu semblant manquer de fiabilité sera jugé par mes soins comme un hérétique. C'est à ce moment-là seulement que le peuple respectera la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: «Aún bulle en mi interior el mismo odio, pero ahora dispongo de un método para darle salida: desatándolo sobre la carroña criminal, y no solo sobre ella. Escépticos, librepensadores, quienquiera que me suscite la más mínima desconfianza; a todos los juzgaré como lo haría con un hereje declarado. Solo así conseguiré que la gente respete la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Aún bulle en mi interior el mismo odio, pero ahora dispongo de un método para darle salida: desatándolo sobre la carroña criminal, y no solo sobre ella. Escépticos, librepensadores, quienquiera que me suscite la más mínima desconfianza; a todos los juzgaré como lo haría con un hereje declarado. Solo así conseguiré que la gente respete la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: “仇恨依然在我心里沸腾，但现在，我已经找到了发泄恨意的手段。我会发泄在那些犯了罪的渣滓身上，而且不仅是他们——每个持怀疑论调的人，每个崇尚自由思想的人，每个表现出不忠迹象的人，我都会把他们当作彻头彻尾的异端分子进行审判。只有这样，我才能让所有人尊重帝国的律法。”
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “仇恨依然在我心里沸腾，但现在，我已经找到了发泄恨意的手段。我会发泄在那些犯了罪的渣滓身上，而且不仅是他们——每个持怀疑论调的人，每个崇尚自由思想的人，每个表现出不忠迹象的人，我都会把他们当作彻头彻尾的异端分子进行审判。只有这样，我才能让所有人尊重帝国的律法。”

languages.text: "İçimde köpüren nefret gücünü yitirmiş değil fakat artık bu nefreti nasıl tatmin edebileceğimi biliyorum. Bu kuvvetli duygu, suçlu leşçillerin gazabı olacak. Bununla da yetinmeyeceğim. Kalbinde şüphe, aklında özgür düşünce olanları ve güvenilirliğini kuşkuyla lekeleyen herkesi kâfir damgasıyla yargılayacağım. Ancak bu şekilde insanların Lex İmperialis'e hürmet etmelerini sağlayabilirim."
languages.original_text: "I still have the same hatred boiling inside me, but now, I have means of releasing it — by bringing it down on criminal carrion, and not just on them. Every doubter, every freethinker, anyone who shows any sign of being unreliable, I will judge as I would an outright heretic. Only then will I make people respect the Lex Imperialis."
